answers.answer: You might want to talk to your doctor  since it's been there so long and is getting bigger.
That sounds more like anemia than diabetes, I have gestational diabetes for the second time and I've never experienced that.
I have gestational diabetes and that hasn't happened you should talk to your doctor
The doctor hasn't told me anything about anemia :/ I have an appointment Wednesday tho. So I'm going to bring it up to him. Thank you guys!

question: Any of you Mommas have gestational diabetes. If so, did u guys bruise easily or get random bruises that take weeks to go away? I have a random bruise that has been on my leg for at least 2 to 3 weeks, I don't know where it came from but it keeps getting bigger. Should I be concerned?
title: gestational diabetes...
